author: Chao Hick Tin JA (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Wee Soon Kim Anthony v Lim Chor Pee
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Judith Prakash J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: The appellant in person; Andre Arul and Ling Leong Hui (Arul Chew and Partners) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Insolvency Law/Bankruptcy/Statutory demand/Appeal against solicitors' successful application to set aside statutory demands issued under s 62 Bankruptcy Act/Whether bills of costs giving rise to valid counterclaim, set-off or cross demand/Whether agreement as to costs existing and status of firm as partnership or sole proprietorship amounting to "genuine triable issues"/Section 62 Bankruptcy Act (Cap 20, 2000 Rev Ed), r 98(2)(a) Bankruptcy Rules (Cap 20, R 1, 2002 Rev Ed)
